title: Check if a Photo is Cleared for Use
description: An editor wants to use a photo found online, but must first verify that the publication has the legal right to use it.

tasks.description: Perform a reverse image search to find the original source and creator of the photograph.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the photographer and where the image was first published.

tasks.description: Check the image's metadata and source for any copyright information or usage licenses (e.g., Creative Commons, Getty Images).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines the copyright status of the image.

tasks.description: If the image is copyrighted, contact the photographer or agency to negotiate a licensing fee.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent either secures the rights to use the image or determines it cannot be used.
